text: |} Sushil Kumar is an Indian sportsman. He is best known as a wrestler who competed in two Summer Olympic Games.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), Sushil Kumar ; retrieved 2012-8-20. ==International competitions== In the 2008 Summer Olympics at Beijing, Kumar won a bronze medal in wrestling. He won a silver medal in the 2012 Summer Olympics at London.London2012.com, Sushil Kumar ; retrieved 2012-8-15. ==Related pages== * Sports in India * India at the Olympics == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Indian wrestlers Category:2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India Category:2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for India Category:Commonwealth Games medallists
title: Sushil Kumar
